Producer: Pablo Zimbrón Alva, Juanelo Hernandez, Rubén Imaz, Yulene Olaizola
Production Co: Contravía Films, Malacosa Cine, Manny Films, Varios Lobos, Barraca Producciones
Synopsis: To escape an arranged marriage, a woman flees into the depths of the Mayan jungle, where untamed nature merges the human with the supernatural.
Title: Tragic Jungle
